headline: Should Investors Chase the Rally in Dollar Tree (DLTR) Stock After Q4 Earnings?
summary: Despite missing top and bottom-line expectations, Dollar Tree (DLTR) shares have soared +13% since reporting its Q4 results on Wednesday with investors applauding the company's decision to sell its ailing Family Dollar business.
